ai-dn16:5.11.1_0: “How should we act, reverend Sir, in regard to the Realised One’s body?”
ai-dn16:5.11.2_0: “Proceed in the same way as they do for the corpse of a wheel-turning monarch.”

ai-dn16:5.11.4_0: “They wrap a wheel-turning monarch’s corpse with unworn cloth.

ai-dn16:5.11.6_0: They build a monument for the wheel-turning monarch at the crossroads.

ai-dn16:5.11.8_0: Proceed in the same way with the Realized One’s corpse.
ai-dn16:5.11.9_0: A monument for the Realized One is to be built at the crossroads.
ai-dn16:5.11.10_0: When someone there lifts up garlands or fragrance or powder, or bows, or inspires confidence in their heart, that will be for their lasting welfare and happiness.
